pageContext.description: Upper part of blade; two rivet holes in shoulder (of) of them torn; a concavity on the upper surface, corresponding with that point from which the missing hilt sprang; besides this is another small concavity representing a third rivet hole. Pointed oval section, edges slightly rough.
pageContext.associations: 2 socketed celts & 5 fragts; 2 socketed gouges & 1 fragt.; 1 socketed knife fragt.; 2 sword fragts; 1 ferrule & 1 fragt.; 1 spearhead VI fragt; 1 copper cake & 25 metal lumps.
pageContext.toSearch: Flansham, Bognor Regis, West Sussex Po22, UK
pageContext.remarks: This hollow represents a third rivet hole.
